snippet: When Texas voters complain to elected politicians about roads and traffic, officeholders take notice.
lead_paragraph: When Texas voters complain to elected politicians about roads and traffic, officeholders take notice.

headline.seo: Texans Dare to Talk Tax, Debt and Tolls for Highway Spending
headline.main: On Matters of Transportation, Some Dare to Bring Up Taxes, Tolls and Debt
headline.print_headline: On Matters of Transportation, Some Dare to Bring Up Taxes, Tolls and Debt
